title: 世界不刷动物，但是刷怪，求解
author: xius
txt_content: 世界里只能刷怪，没有动物，只有动物蛋可以

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
mv多世界插件配置文件里：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-101532-1-7.html
plotworld:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: "&2\u5730\u76ae\u4e16\u754c"
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'false'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: EASY
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'false'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      yaw: 0.0
      pitch: 0.0
      z: 3.5
      y: 66.0
      x: 3.5
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '-854451000442004703'
    generator: PlotMe
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'复制代码

spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
控制怪物和动物生成，望采纳为最佳答案

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
有可能是多世界插件导致的（multiverse）

/mvm set animals true 世界名称

试试
